start.text: Hey there, handsome. How are you doing?

choices.text: Hi, I'm good. Thanks for asking. How about you?

hi.text: I'm doing well, thank you. I couldn't help but notice you at the coffee shop the other day. You looked so cute and confident.😊

choices.text: Thank you so much. That's very sweet of you to say.

very_sweet_of_you_to_say.text: I know this might sound forward, but I was wondering if you'd like to go out with me sometime? I'd love to take you out to dinner.

choices.text: Hmm, I don't know. I'm not sure I have time for a date right now

1_i_dont_know.text: I understand though, you're a busy guy. But I do have an offer for you. I could use some help with my work, and I'd be willing to pay you for your time.

choices.text: Oh really? What kind of work is it?

2_sure.text: Mama: Great! How about tomorrow night? I know a great restaurant that I think you'll love.

what_kind_of_work.text: Well, I'm a business owner, and I have a lot of administrative tasks that I need help with. Things like scheduling appointments, answering emails, and managing my calendar. I could pay you well for your help, and it wouldn't take up too much of your time.

choices.text: Hmm, that does sound interesting. I could use some extra cash.

that_does_sound_interesting.text: Great! Why don't we meet up for coffee sometime and discuss the details?

choices.text: Sure, that sounds good. what time?

what_time.text: 7PM, I can't wait to get to know you better.

choices.text: No. i dont own a car at the moment

1_vw_polo.text: Oh dear. we cant use that one. ill come with my G wagon 😉🚗

2_i_dont_have_a_car.text: Ok ill come pick you up with 1 of my cars

cool.text: What outfit will you be wearing?

casual.text: Ok whats your bank account details? ill send you some money. I want you to look like a Handsome business man that you are.😊

1_for_real.text: Yeah im gonna send you R20K, would that be enough?

capitac_bank.text: Ok Handsome. How much do you need?

any_amount.text: Ok Handsome. ive sent R20K😉😊. that should cover everything. i also need you to have energy for the night

choices.text: Wow. Thank you. ill sure do have that energy you looking for😉

5k.text: Ok Handsome. but ive sent R20K😉😊. that should cover everything. i also need you to have energy for the night

20k.text: Ok Handsome. ive sent R20K😉😊. that should cover everything. i also need you to have energy for the night

amazed.text: Ok cool. Let me get back to work now. will chat later King

end.text: end of chat. for now clear app data to restart the chats
